dt-option.name: fixedColumns.rightColumns
dt-option.summary: Number of columns to fix to the right of the table

type.description: The number of columns on the right hand side of the table to fix in place.

dt-option.default: No columns will be fixed to the right hand side of the table.
dt-option.description: FixedColumns can fix columns to both the left and right hand sides of the DataTable. By default only a single left hand column is fixed in place, but this parameter provides the option to specify how many columns should be fixed on the right. This is a simple integer that indicates that number of columns.

example.title: Fix no columns on the left of the table
